text: 8.10: Sek 8.8; Hi 10.16Gu zumgum suanga kaman kameŋ, gu Isreriŋ gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨ suanga kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgirga. Gu, Guma Bakɨme, gu zumgum won tɨvir mbe ndɨkndɨgir tɨgɨrga. Gu vhɨra wo tɨvir mbe ndavi vheri khergirga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgip, gu mben Fhe Bakɨme kɨrga, mbe nan gumgi gu mbigi kɨrga.
